summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWN A 2010 PONTIAC G6.  THE CONTACT STATED THAT WHILE DRIVING APPROXIMATELY 55 MPH, THE STEERING WHEEL SUDDENLY MALFUNCTIONED.  THE CONTACT MANEUVERED TO THE SHOULDER AND SHUT OFF THE ENGINE. ONCE THE VEHICLE WAS RESTARTED, THE STEERING ASSIST FUNCTIONED PROPERLY.  THE FAILURE WAS RECURRING OVER A THREE WEEK PERIOD.  THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO THE DEALER, WHO INDICATED THAT THE POWER STEERING FAILED AND WOULD NEED REPLACING.  THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOT NOTIFIED OF THE FAILURE.  THE APPROXIMATE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 93,000.   *TR
